item.description:
Feathers Wellness Studio just reopened.  Open house on Saturday the 14th and FREE, yes you read that right FREE classes all day on Sunday the 15th!!!

Here's their website:
http://www.featherswellnessstudio.com/

**THIS IS A DROP IN EVENT WITHOUT AN ORGANIZER**

Just pop on by to check out this studio for any classes you wish and please check out their website as well.  No organizers from this meetup group will be leading this, but too great to not post as an event if anyone is interested.

Here is the 1/15 Free Yoga and Qigong classes schedule:
12-12:55 Meg - Yoga
1-1:55 Monica - Yoga
2-2:55 Lisa - Power Yoga
3-3:55 Lesley - Yogalates
4-4:25 Anne Marie - QiGong
4:30-6 Michelle - Gentle, Restoritive, Meditation and/or Yoga Nidra

Also offered & coming up:

Special pricing on Cymatron/Reiki sessions and Massages this month
Cymatron sessions $65
Massages with Keith $65
Hot Stone Massages $85

1/13 FridEase: Gentle yoga, restoritive, Yin, meditation, Yoga Nidra Guided meditation. $25
1/14 Open House 5-9pm There will be food, drinks, music, most of the teachers will be there and a listing of the classes.
Coupons will be sold for discounts on Cymatron/Reiki sessions, massages, hot stone massage.

1/17 QiGong from 5:45-6:15pm 6 wks $60 or 12 dropin
1/17 Beginners from 6:30pm to 7:45pm
1/18 Upper body Core work out with Personal Trainer RYT Monica Billard 8 wk series
1/19 Qigong 8 wk morning series 80 or 12 drop in
1/20 Bellydancing workshop $25 7-9pm
1/27 Kids yoga 4:30-5:45
1/27 Thai Massage workshop 7-9pm $25
1/28 Lower body / Core workshop with Pilates instructor Lesley Fairbanks 8wk series

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: FREE YOGA CLASSES!!!
